55 /*========== Includes =======================================================*/
56 #include "unity.h"
57 
58 #include "fstd_types.h"
59 #include "ltc_pec.h"
60 #include "test_assert_helper.h"
61 
62 TEST_FILE("ltc_pec.c")
63 
64 /*========== Definitions and Implementations for Unit Test ==================*/
65 
66 /* test for PEC computation on command */
67 uint8_t byte2Test0[2u] = {0x12u, 0x34u};
68 uint8_t byte2Test1[2u] = {0xBEu, 0xEFu};
69 uint8_t byte2Test2[2u] = {0x00u, 0x01u};
70 uint8_t byte2Test3[2u] = {0x07u, 0x23u};
71 uint8_t byte2Test4[2u] = {0x03u, 0x60u};
72 /* test for PEC computation on 6 bytes of data */
73 uint8_t byte6Test0[6u] = {0x12u, 0x34u, 0x56u, 0x78u, 0x9Au, 0xBCu};
74 uint8_t byte6Test1[6u] = {0xFFu, 0xFFu, 0xFFu, 0xFFu, 0xFFu, 0xFFu};
75 uint8_t byte6Test2[6u] = {0xBEu, 0xEFu, 0xBEu, 0xEFu, 0xBEu, 0xEFu};
76 uint8_t byte6Test3[6u] = {0xA0u, 0xB0u, 0xC0u, 0xD0u, 0xE0u, 0xF0u};
77 uint8_t byte6Test4[6u] = {0x01u, 0x2Eu, 0x9Bu, 0x33u, 0xACu, 0x55u};
78 
79 /*========== Setup and Teardown =============================================*/
80 void setUp(void) {
81 }
82 
83 void tearDown(void) {
84 }
85 
86 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
87 
88 void testLtcPec15(void) {
89  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(2u, byte2Test0), 0x1DD4u);
90  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(2u, byte2Test1), 0xFD2Cu);
91  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(2u, byte2Test2), 0x3D6Eu);
92  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(2u, byte2Test3), 0xB9E4u);
93  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(2u, byte2Test4), 0xF46Cu);
94 
95  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(6u, byte6Test0), 0xBC24u);
96  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(6u, byte6Test1), 0x664Cu);
97  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(6u, byte6Test2), 0x845Au);
98  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(6u, byte6Test3), 0x792Cu);
99  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(LTC_CalculatePec15(6u, byte6Test4), 0xD522u);
100 }
101 
102 void testLtcPec15InvalidInput(void) {
103  /* invalid data length */
104  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(LTC_CalculatePec15(0, byte2Test0));
105  /* invalid data */
106  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(LTC_CalculatePec15(1, NULL_PTR));
107 }
